comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of bowls of goat curry
- y: number of bowls of chicken curry

Objective:
Minimize Z = 6x + 5y (total amount of curry base used)

Constraints:
- 3x \leq 1500 (goat meat constraint)
- 5y \leq 2000 (chicken meat constraint)
- y \geq 0.25(x + y) (at least 25% of bowls must be chicken curry)
- x > y (number of goat curry bowls must be larger than chicken curry bowls)
